titles.title: Hispanic-Serving Institution Assistance Improvement Act of 2003
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to expand and extend the eligibility of Hispanic-serving institutions for assistance under title V of that Act.
Hispanic-Serving Institution Assistance Improvement Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: Hispanic-Serving Institution Assistance Improvement Act of 2003 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to expand and extend the eligibility of Hispanic-serving institutions for assistance under title V (Developing Institutions), by eliminating the two-year wait-out period between any two five-year grants.
